thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com | 4 of 69
thread.title: William (Bill) Friddell
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by William (Bill) Friddell

author: William (Bill) Friddell
title: William (Bill) Friddell
text: Pelican shipped a double order and then took 2 weeks to get call tags for a pickup and then no one let me know when to put it out for pick up. I have had to call numerous times to make the pickup and now my credit card has not been credited yet. If I knew there customer service was so bad I would have not purchased the system from them. I was told they would send me some extra filters to make up for the hassle but haven't seen anything yet. Bottom line they suck.
